name: evox6MinuteDailyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: On a day-to-day basis we link with hundreds of grassroots organizations who keep us informed on a cross-cutting range of social justice, environmental and economic issues. Currently, tens of thousands of media outlets receive our content and more than 8,000 nationally are regularly using our stories, reaching a combined national weekly audience of over 40 Million. evox welcomes you to join our community on the evox.life app on Google Play or the App Store. You can also read more stories, watch our shows and shop for green, organic and sustainable products at www.evox.life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
